players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Bob was found dead.

Diana: "Let's all work together to uncover the truth. Charlie, since you know I'm the detective and you're acting innocent, it might be wise to reveal your alibi or any information that could help us solve this case."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Diana is the detective, so she knows who I am."
You: "I didn't kill Bob. I was at home all night."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie

players.name: Diana

Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
